title: My Young Lord Is Really Righteous - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Daoism   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings
author: Li Hongtian   李鸿天
description:
“My lord, you are the embodiment of justice!” “You are unrivaled, humble and easy-going, you abhorred evil as your nemesis!” “Without your presence in this world, it would be as dark as eternal night!” 

Stop it! Stop with the praising! I am not the embodiment of justice! I want to do bad things, I want to be the antagonist! I want to cultivate evil martial arts, bully everyone on the street and slay everyone in the famous houses! I even want to usurp the throne! I am really a bad guy! 

>
